scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start:prod || npm run start:dev
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm run dev" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.build: cd ../client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.prebuild: cd server && npm install && npm i --save-dev @types/express @types/bcrypt && npm run compile
